body:
Comment 4 by **simonedichiara@maior.biz**: 
I was using this C:\Go\bin\gotour.exe and it didn't work. 
I assumed that "use go to install gotour" simply meant to run this: "go get
code.google.com/p/go-tour/gotour". It actually generated the executable that I was using
(C:\Go\bin\gotour.exe) and so I thought that that was the way it was meant to be.

Anyway, thank you very much. :)
